Name: Meekanoid
About the game: The player controls a platform that can be moved from one wall to another by placing it under the ball, preventing it from falling. Hitting a brick with a ball leads to the destruction of a whole brick. After all the bricks at this level are destroyed, the transition to the next level takes place with a new set of bricks in large quantities. - 15 unique interesting levels - exciting simple - cool music - unusual design
